2.6.22  6:32 pm   I am going to graduate and become an adult very soon. However I can't help but feel as though I have wasted my childhood to a degree. 2.6.22  8:44 am   while reading the lyrics in the questions the last few days, i noticed how vividly i had remembered your songs. as i read the words on the screen i instantly heard the melody and a whole bunch of the other stuff really easily. now i don't have perfect pitch, but when i went and checked the songs to see i was always exactly on pitch as well. this happens to me sometimes with other people's songs when i play them in my head (which i do all the time) but with yours it seems i have a much better chance. usually i can't tell at all if i'm playing a song in the wrong key in my head though, but reading your lyrics made it super vivid. it's not that i think they have to be in one key, but when i hear you singing it in my head it my memory is just especially vivid. i think i remember you saying you always do a range test for your songs. might this be part of it?

      i think a lot of other music i listen to is made before someone sings "over" it and that probably results with people singing something in a way that could have been expressed better slightly higher or lower. also interesting because i am not usually a person who digests lyrics easily. i'm terrible at remembering them, but as soon as i read them the song sprung to life
